scripts.build: npm run build:js && npm run generate:ts-def && npm run test
scripts.build:openssl:c: cd packages/openssl && ./config && make clean && make && cp libcrypto.a ../../lib/
scripts.build:c: clang -Llib/ test/test.c -ldl -pthread -lcrypto -D CRYPTO_TDEBUG=1 -Ipackages/openssl/include -Ipackages/openssl/include/openssl -o dist/km && npm run c:run
scripts.build:wasm: emcc -O3 src/c/main.c src/c/certgen.c src/c/utilities.c -g -static -Wl,--initial-memory=655360,--export=processCSR,--export=createCertificate,--export=createCertificateSigningRequest,--export=cleanup,--export=createBuffer,--export=destroyBuffer,--export=convertKey -Llib/wasm -lcrypto --target=wasm32-unknown-wasi -D CRYPTO_TDEBUG=1 -s SINGLE_FILE -s EXPORT_ES6=1 --sysroot=/opt/wasi-sysroot -I/opt/wasi-sysroot/include -Ipackages/openssl/include -Ipackages/openssl/include/openssl -Isrc/c/include -I/usr/include/netinet -I/usr/include/x86_x64-linux-gnu/bits -o dist/keymaster.wasm.js
scripts.build:js: npm run build:wasm && npm run generate:define && npm run build:rollup
scripts.generate:ts-def: cp ./src/js/index.mjs index.js && tsc index.js --declaration --allowJs --emitDeclarationOnly --outDir ./dist && rm index.js
